iti5:1.1: This was said by the Buddha, the Perfected One: that is what I heard.
iti5:2.4: Disdain is the one thing. Give it up,
iti5:2.6: That is what the Buddha said.
iti5:3.2: beings go to a bad place.
iti5:3.6: they never return to this world.”
iti5:4.1: This too was spoken by the Blessed One: that is what I heard.
